name: LandPort
description:
LandPort:Intelligent Service Area in the ioT is a simulation business game, where you can be called a LandPort administrator, dispatch everything on the scene in front of the console, and help your LandPort become a popular one. Journey Station.
In the game, you can observe the travel of tourists, the work of on-site staff, and the operation of equipment from the perspective of God.

You need to be involved in scheduling, deciding what route the tourists or administrators should take, choosing the best destination for tourists, and assigning tasks to field workers.

At present, the game only opens the vehicle scheduling system. Thanks to the automatic driving, the vehicles entering the service area will be controlled by you, and you can choose suitable parking spaces for them. Timely scheduling can increase the satisfaction of tourists, otherwise it will lead to traffic congestion. .

In the future, we will open up more management functions, such as logistics, supermarkets, rest areas, etc. At the same time, automatic hosting will be included, which will free your hands to a certain extent.
